trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> objects which persist in a Windows Address Book.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> salvati in modo permanente in una Rubrica di Windows.

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructors, since a reference to it is returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> class.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non ha alcun costruttore pubblico, poiché restituisce un riferimento a esso la <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> classe.

trans-unit.source: Address books that are associated with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> management include those associated with the host peer and a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Le rubriche associati <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> management includono quelle associate al peer host e un peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: Either computer may collaborate with other peers; when a peer is local to the remote peer but not the host peer, it can be added to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Entrambi i computer possono collaborare con gli altri peer. Quando un peer locale per il peer remoto ma non il peer di host, può essere aggiunto per il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> del peer host.

trans-unit.source: Certain operations on the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> class, such as <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A>, correlate to the associated operations being performed on the Windows Address book of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Determinate operazioni sul <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> classe, ad esempio <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A> e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A>, sono correlate alle operazioni eseguite nella Rubrica di Windows del peer remoto associate.

trans-unit.source: The host peer has access to this persistent storage for <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> information, which can be associated with the applications in which a peer intends to participate.
trans-unit.target: Il peer host può accedere a questo archivio persistente per <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> informazioni che possono essere associate alle applicazioni in cui un peer intende partecipare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> can identify itself as a user of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> persistent store on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> identificare se stesso come un utente di un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> archivio permanente in un computer.

trans-unit.source: The following example code illustrates how to enumerate a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> and add it as a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> to the local <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come enumerare un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> e aggiungerlo come un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> locale <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> instance to add to <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> da aggiungere a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> specificato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> del peer locale.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The following example code illustrates how to enumerate a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> and add it as a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> to the local <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come enumerare un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> e aggiungerlo come un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> locale <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> specified by <paramref name="peerContact" /> already exists.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> specificato da <paramref name="peerContact" /> esiste già.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="peerContact" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerContact" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="peerContact" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il valore specificato per il parametro <paramref name="peerContact" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> specified by <paramref name="peerContact" /> could not be reconstituted from its serialized XML format.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile ricostruire l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> specificato da <paramref name="peerContact" /> dal rispettivo formato XML serializzato.

trans-unit.source: Unable to add the local peer to the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> instance being constructed.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile aggiungere il peer locale all'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> in fase di costruzione.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che un <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> associato a un <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> contenuto in <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: This method only returns applications published by contacts of the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce solo le applicazioni pubblicate dal contatti del peer chiamante.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di questo evento può essere generato, l'utente corrente del peer remoto deve eseguire la sottoscrizione agli eventi di collaborazione del peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La sottoscrizione viene eseguita tramite il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto chiamante è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> to associate with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> da associare alla nuova istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> instance for the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> instance for the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> relativa all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="peerNearMe" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerNearMe" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The contact manager of the remote peer passed in <paramref name="peerNearMe" /> could not be reached, or the contact could not be read from it.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato possibile raggiungere l'oggetto Gestione contatti del peer remoto passato a <paramref name="peerNearMe" />, oppure non è stato possibile leggere il contatto da tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance passed in <paramref name="peerNearMe" /> has no endpoints set on it.
trans-unit.target: Per l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> passata a <paramref name="peerNearMe" /> non è stato impostato alcun endpoint.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> to associate with the new <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> da associare alla nuova istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" />.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains information about the <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe,System.Object)" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> definito dall'utente che contiene informazioni sull'operazione <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe,System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: It will be passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Verrà passato al callback dell'operazione asincrona per l'identificazione.

trans-unit.source: Creates a contact instance for the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di contatto per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="userToken" /> already exists and is in use.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="userToken" /> esiste già ed è in uso.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="peerNearMe" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerNearMe" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> instance has no endpoints set on it.
trans-unit.target: L'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe" /> specificata non ha alcun endpoint impostato.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever a <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe)" /> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che viene completata l'esecuzione di un metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe)" />.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato quando il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A> completamento del metodo.

trans-unit.source: It is also raised if the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> operation completes in error or is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato anche se il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> operazione completata con errori o è stata annullata.

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto chiamante è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> or <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> o un <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> del peer locale.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> da rimuovere da <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> specificato da <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> del peer locale.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to delete a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> from the local <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come eliminare un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> da locale <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="peerContact" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerContact" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> da rimuovere da <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associated with the specified <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associato alla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> specificata da <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> del peer locale.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to delete a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> from the local <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come eliminare un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> da locale <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associated with <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> could not be found in the contact manager.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato possibile trovare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associato a <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> in Gestione contatti.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="peerName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This object has had <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.Dispose" /> previously called on it and cannot be used for future operations.
trans-unit.target: Su questo oggetto era già stato precedentemente chiamato il metodo <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.Dispose" /> e non può essere usato per operazioni future.

trans-unit.source: Unable to complete <see cref="Overload:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile completare l'operazione <see cref="Overload:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> da recuperare.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> object for the specified <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> relativo all'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associated with the supplied <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> fornito.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="peerName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerName" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Contact not found in <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato possibile trovare il contatto in <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Unable to obtain the contact for the supplied <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" />.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato possibile ottenere il contatto per l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> fornito.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection" /> that contains all contacts within the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection" /> contenente tutti i contatti presenti all'interno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> del peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection" /> that contains all contacts within the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection" /> contenente tutti i contatti presenti all'interno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> del peer remoto.

trans-unit.source: If the contact manager is empty, then a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se Gestione contatti è vuoto, viene restituito un insieme avente dimensioni nulle.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to retrieve a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection> representing the contacts contained in the local <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come recuperare un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection> che rappresenta i contatti contenuti nell'oggetto locale <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>:

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer" /> in this peer contact collection.
trans-unit.target: Il tentativo di enumerazione di un <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer" /> appartenente all'insieme di contatti peer corrente ha comportato la restituzione di un valore non valido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> representing the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> che rappresenta il peer locale.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> instance representing the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> che rappresenta il peer locale.

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: A meno che venga specificato, il valore predefinito di questa proprietà è `null`.

trans-unit.source: Using this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di questa proprietà richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever the <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName" /> associato a un <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> contenuto in <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: The associated callback provides a reference to the new <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il callback associato fornisce un riferimento al nuovo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto chiamante è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever an object within a contact’s registered <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> objects has changed.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che viene modificato uno degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> registrati in un contatto.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di questo evento può essere generato, l'utente corrente del peer remoto deve eseguire la sottoscrizione agli eventi di collaborazione del peer host.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: La sottoscrizione viene eseguita tramite l'oggetto di PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever the presence status of a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato ogni volta che viene modificato lo stato di presenza di un <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> contenuto in <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di questo evento può essere generato, l'utente corrente del peer remoto deve eseguire la sottoscrizione agli eventi di collaborazione del peer host.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La sottoscrizione viene eseguita tramite il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the list of subscribed contacts changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando viene modificato l'elenco dei contatti sottoscritti.

trans-unit.source: Since subscriptions are per user and not per process or per application domain, another application running on the host may also cause this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Poiché le sottoscrizioni sono per utente e non per processo o per dominio applicazione, un'altra applicazione in esecuzione nell'host può causare la generazione dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiede che un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta questo valore di proprietà, i gestori eventi di tutti gli eventi non generati a seguito di un'operazione asincrona verranno richiamati nel thread che ha creato l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject" /> specifico.

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> e che viene utilizzato da istanze di questo tipo per la sincronizzazione dei gestori eventi nel thread che ha creato tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del set predefinito di questa proprietà è `null`, che indica che tutti i gestori eventi vengono chiamati in un thread di pool di thread di sistema.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Impostare questa proprietà viene in genere un elemento dell'interfaccia utente, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto chiamante è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> to be updated.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> da aggiornare.

trans-unit.source: Updates the data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna i dati associati a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" />.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> not found in <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile trovare <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> in <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="peerContact" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerContact" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Unable to complete <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.UpdateContact(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact)" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile completare l'operazione <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.UpdateContact(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact)" />.
